T02D2210:182a-1: a'a rya n'i l'a mba ra dha badzra p'a ni
T02D2210:182a-2: s'a dha na no pi ka / bod skad du
T02D2210:182a-3: / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2210:182a-4: dpal ldan gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2210:182a-6: kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs kun //
T02D2210:182a-7: sgron mes gsal phyir sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2210:182a-8: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la gus btud de //
T02D2210:182a-9: bla ma brgyud pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D2210:182a-10: klu yi byang chub nyid kyis rim //
T02D2210:182a-11: bzhin bshad rigs rnams 'os su grub pa yi //
T02D2210:182a-12: sngags pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i //
T02D2210:182a-13: yid 'od bkra shis bde gnas su //
T02D2210:182a-14: bla med rgyu ru rag gnas la //
T02D2210:182a-15: snying gar nyi la h'um bzhag ste //
T02D2210:182a-16: byin brlabs bltas te bka' bsgo la //
T02D2210:182a-17: 'od kyis bgegs la thog rnams dbab //
T02D2210:182a-18: bhr'um gyi tshig dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2210:182a-20: / rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang //
T02D2210:182a-21: me yi khang pa yong su thub //
T02D2210:182a-23: dzva la ram yang yongs su brjod //
T02D2210:182a-24: g-yas pa'i ram dang g-yon pa'i aa /
T02D2210:182a-25: snying rjes bgegs gsos byer bar 'gyur //
T02D2210:182a-26: rgyud 'os gyur nas rang byung gi / de 'od las byung nyid kyil du //
T02D2210:182a-27: slob dpon sangs rgyas bcas spyan drang //
T02D2210:182a-28: bla ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin la //
T02D2210:182a-29: phyag 'tshal phyi nang bzhi yis mchod //
T02D2210:182a-30: sdig pa bshags nas sdom pa gzung //
T02D2210:182a-31: yi rang bskul dang gsol ba gdab //
T02D2210:182a-32: bsod dang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed de //
T02D2210:182b-0: tshad med bzhi po yongs su @182b bskyed //
T02D2210:182b-1: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rnam pa kun //
T02D2210:182b-2: thams cad yongs su dag pa las //
T02D2210:182b-3: rang byung sngags bskyed 'byung ba yi //
T02D2210:182b-4: gzhal yas lam ldan rab tu bcas //
T02D2210:182b-5: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2210:182b-6: ka ba brgyad dang rin chen mdzes //
T02D2210:182b-7: dra ba dra phyed pha gu dang //
T02D2210:182b-8: dar dpyangs rta babs rnams dang ldan ;
T02D2210:182b-9: / seng ge 'khor lo nyi zla'i gdan //
T02D2210:182b-10: de steng h'um las rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2210:182b-11: de las dpal ldan gnyis kyi bdag / nyon mongs kun sel gtum bo'i gzugs //
T02D2210:182b-12: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la brgyan //
T02D2210:182b-13: mthing ga gos sngon sku la gsol //
T02D2210:182b-14: rdo rje dril bu lag na thogs //
T02D2210:182b-15: thun mong las dang rjes mthun no //
T02D2210:182b-16: mchog kyang thogs pa med par ro //
T02D2210:182b-17: sbrul bzhis lus la rnam par brgyan //
T02D2210:182b-18: spyan dmar mche gtsigs sbrul nag za //
T02D2210:182b-19: rin chen dpa' bo'i chas kyis brgyan //
T02D2210:182b-20: brkyang bskum khro bo brjid pa'i zhal //
T02D2210:182b-21: gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs pa can //
T02D2210:182b-22: de gsal mdun du ye shes dgug / bgegs bsal mchod dang gtor mas mnyes //
T02D2210:182b-23: ae ma ho dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02D2210:182b-24: lus kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2210:182b-25: ye shes thugs rje chen po'i dang //
T02D2210:182b-26: bdag lus ye shes skur byin rlobs //
T02D2210:182b-28: de nas sku gsung thugs gnas su ;
T02D2210:182b-31: bsdus shid bsregs te sbyangs pa las //
T02D2210:182b-32: ye shes gsum ni gnas su bzhag / ye shes rigs ldas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2210:182b-33: dbang bskur mi bskyod rigs ldas brgyan //
T02D2210:182b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D2210:182b-36: dag yongs su dag par byas te /
T02D2210:182b-38: gsal ba rnam gnyis rags dang phra //
T02D2210:182b-39: bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam pa la //
T02D2210:182b-40: gsal bar byed pa de nyid do //
T02D2210:182b-41: rgyud rnams sbyangs pa'i bzlas pa ni //
T02D2210:182b-42: rags pa dang ni phra ba'o //
T02D2210:182b-43: rags pa gnyis te ba thag dang //
T02D2210:182b-44: ba thag med de gnyis ka la //
T02D2210:182b-45: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma'i tshul //
T02D2210:182b-46: phra yang gsum du 'byung ba ni //
T02D2210:182b-47: h'um bskul bsreg pa ram yin te //
T02D2210:182b-48: lte bar bkru spyi bo aa //
T02D2210:182b-49: mtshan ma 'dod pa'i bzlas pa la //
T02D2210:182b-50: rnam pa lngar 'dis ma byas pa //
T02D2210:183a-2: ba thag gzings dang dmigs pa med //
T02D2210:183a-3: snying gar bskor ro mtshan ma 'byung //
T02D2210:183a-4: ram dang h'um las me byung bas //
T02D2210:183a-5: ye shes lus su gsal bar snang //
T02D2210:183a-6: grub rtags thon pa'i rtags gsum las //
T02D2210:183a-7: 'od sgra sku ston sgyu ma dang //
T02D2210:183a-8: tshogs dang gtor mas bzlog par bya //
T02D2210:183a-9: de rjes sangs rgyas lung ston 'byung //
T02D2210:183a-10: grogs ni khrus dang sreg dang tshe //
T02D2210:183a-12: tshogs dang sbyin sreg gsad pa dang //
T02D2210:183a-13: tsha tsha gtor ma la sogs pa //
T02D2210:183a-15: de nas gser la sogs pa 'grub //
T02D2210:183a-16: mchog 'dod pa yi sems can gyis //
T02D2210:183a-17: thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo bzhi //
T02D2210:183a-18: snying nas sbyor ba gsum gyi rtsa //
T02D2210:183a-19: yi ge thig les yang dag mtshan //
T02D2210:183a-20: dbus su thabs dang shes rab 'bar //
T02D2210:183a-21: dbu ma dbyings nas sprul pa ru //
T02D2210:183a-22: ye shes gsal bar dbyings la thug / de tshe mi gnas bsam dang bral //
T02D2210:183a-23: 'gro ba'i tshe dbang gang gi rtsa //
T02D2210:183a-24: kha phyi ba yi nang nas thig le bsam //
T02D2210:183a-25: ba thag phug nas thig le la //
T02D2210:183a-26: thim mo de la blo gtad pas //
T02D2210:183a-28: 'jug pa ba thag bzhi po yang //
T02D2210:183a-29: srid gsum 'joms pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2210:183a-30: stong ba thag bzhi por thim //
T02D2210:183a-31: dbang po thig le med pa la //
T02D2210:183a-32: dbu ma chen po'i dbyings nyid du //
T02D2210:183a-33: ye shes phra mo las kyis spros //
T02D2210:183a-36: rtags lnga la bzla phyag rgya yi //
T02D2210:183a-37: ye shes chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2210:183a-38: 'di ni gang zag snod can la //
T02D2210:183a-39: gang zag tshul 'chos g-yo can rnams //
T02D2210:183a-40: gsang sngags phrag khyer ngan sod rgyu //
T02D2210:183a-41: de la sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D2210:183a-42: tshul bzhin bsgrub pa'i gang zag la //
T02D2210:183a-43: dngos grub klu mo mkha' 'gros ster //
T02D2210:183a-44: brgyud pa'i rim pa man dag 'di bkod pas //
T02D2210:183a-45: tshig dang don la nyes pa yang yod srid //
T02D2210:183a-46: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang ;
T02D2210:183a-47: / mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02D2210:183a-48: khengs pa rnyed pa bkur stir la sogs min //
T02D2210:183a-49: phyi rabs rtsod pa'i dus su sems can dngos grub 'byung //
T02D2210:183a-50: 'di brtsams pa yi bsod nams kyis //
T02D2210:183a-51: khams gsum sems can ma lus kun //
T02D2210:183b-0: rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa @183b kun spangs nas //
